Body: Description: We are attempting to update the web certificate again as it has expired and the normal fields are not accepting the certs we generated. Please advise on what is required to generate the certs or have the server accept the certs. A full procedure for this normal operation would be great to have for this issue. cc michael.almaguer@bluehalo.com

What We've Learned Updated: 30.04
Sent the instructions for Server Certificate set up/update

Next Steps Updated: 30.04
Wait for the customer to confirm if it worked, otherwise, we'll schedule a remote session.

What We've Learned Updated: 30.04

The customer is still getting the error when uploading the server certificate. We asked for a remote session.
